comments.text:
Created attachment 502425
Screenshot for Page Info

If web site owner name is long it is truncated in the Page Info.
User cannot know correct owner information.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open https://www.jpcert.or.jp/event/half-day_Camp-seminar.html
2. Open Page Info
3. Click Security tab

Actual result:
Owner name is truncated.

Expected result:
Owner name is not truncated.
(That is "Japan Computer Emergency Response Team Coordination Center")
comments.creator: hidenosuke@hidenosuke.org
